TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , LOC .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE the applicant , acting as a participant of rescue operation on the site of the GPE nuclear disaster in DATE , applied to a local council , requesting them to grant him a flat .
CARDINAL . Having faced a refusal , the applicant filed a suit in court .
CARDINAL . By judgment of ORG the local authorities were ordered to grant the applicant a flat of QUANTITY . It became final on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the writ of execution was issued and sent to the bailiffs .

CARDINAL . It appears that on DATE the local authorities , acting in agreement with the applicant and with his financial participation , purchased a CARDINAL - room flat of QUANTITY for the applicant .
CARDINAL . The contract has been registered on DATE .
CARDINAL . DATE , on DATE , the local authorities transferred the money for the flat to the seller 's account .
CARDINAL . According to the Government , the judgment of DATE should be considered as fully enforced on DATE .
